struct OptionRegistry.OptionOffer storage ref[] storage ref

params.exchange: An IExchange conmpatible on chain exchange
params.uint32Params: An array of all the unit32 params according to: 0 - volatility 1 - fee
params.uintParams: An array of all the unit params according to: 0 - duration 1 - minDuration 2 - maxAssetsLocked 3 - tokenAmount - if there are any tokens to add to the position

params.offerIndex: index of offer facilitating the lock
index of offer facilitating the lock

addOffer(uint32[2],uint256[4],bool,addre.notice: Creates an option offer, attempting to pull tokenAmount and msg.value for UX

lockEthAtPrice(uint256,uint256).notice: Locks amountToLock ether at current rate (for duration) and attempts to pull amountToLock*etherRate*volatility*fee

lockTokenAtPrice(uint256,uint256).notice: Locks amountToLock token at current rate (for duration) and attempts to pull amountToLock*tokenRate*volatility*fee

takeLock(uint256,uint256).notice: Sends locked amount to user and takes the assets according ot the original locked rate
